comments:
I20070306-1200

If a contributed tab to a given launch modes fails to load (when the tab group wrapper asks for it), null entries can get inserted into the listing of tabs to show when we switch launch configurations.

to reproduce:
1. have contributed tabs whose class cannot be instantiated (a bogus class name in the plugin xml should do it
2. open the launch dialog in the case where that tab should be visible
3. POW you get the follwing error:

the launch dialog should be tollerant to these kinds of failures, and just not show the tab if it is not available.

fixed in HEAD

see LaunchConfigurationTabGroupWrapper
hmmm, seems to be larger issue here, reopening to investigate, might just be something messed up on my local machine
this bug was caused by an out of date launch configuration.
